snippet.title: Inkbound - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description: Join developer Shiny Shoe's CEO Mark Cooke for a deep dive into the gameplay, including a peek at the turn-based combat system and more, from Inkbound, an upcoming tactical online co-op roguelike RPG from the creators of Monster Train. Inkbound is coming to Steam Early Access in Q2 2023.
